text: Killer Clans is a 1976 Hong Kong martial arts film directed by Chor Yuen and produced by the Shaw Brothers Studio. The film is loosely based on the novel Liuxing Hudie Jian by Gu Long. ==Cast== * Chung Wa * Chen Ping * Ku Feng * Yueh Hua * Lo Lieh * Wong Chung * Cheng Li * Fan Mei Sheng * Yeung Chi Hing * Ling Yun * Alan Chui Chung-San ==References== ==External links== * IMDb entry * HK Cinemagic entry Category:Hong Kong films Category:1976 films Category:1976 martial arts films Category:1970s martial arts films Category:Shaw Brothers Studio films Category:Films directed by Chor Yuen Category:Kung fu films Category:Hong Kong martial arts films Category:Films based on works by Gu Long
title: Killer Clans
